instruction: Generate a script for a commercial that promotes an animal adoption center.
output:
Scene 1: We open on a young couple entering an animal adoption center, full of excited children and barking dogs. 

Voice-over: At the animal adoption center, you’ll find your furry best friend! 

Scene 2: We see the couple walking around with a few small dogs, laughing and talking.

Voice-over: Choose from a wonderful selection of cats, dogs, and other animals, perfect for every family. 

Scene 3: We see the couple leaving with their new pup and waving goodbye to the staff at the center.

Voice-over: When you adopt, you save a life! Adopt today!
